PROFILE_SETTINGS.TITLE: சுயவிவர அமைப்புகள்
PROFILE_SETTINGS.AVATAR_DELETE_FAILED: There is an error while deleting avatar, please try again
PROFILE_SETTINGS.UPDATE_SUCCESS: Your profile has been updated successfully
PROFILE_SETTINGS.PASSWORD_UPDATE_SUCCESS: Your password has been changed successfully
PROFILE_SETTINGS.AFTER_EMAIL_CHANGED: உங்கள் சுயவிவரம் வெற்றிகரமாக புதுப்பிக்கப்பட்டது, உங்கள் உள்நுழைவு சான்றுகள் மாற்றப்பட்டதால் மீண்டும் உள்நுழையவும்

PROFILE_SECTION.TITLE: சுயவிவரம்
PROFILE_SECTION.NOTE: உங்கள் ஈ-மெயில் முகவரியே உங்கள் அடையாளம் மற்றும் உள்நுழையவும் பயன்படுகிறது.

SEND_MESSAGE.TITLE: Hotkey to send messages
SEND_MESSAGE.NOTE: You can select a hotkey (either Enter or Cmd/Ctrl+Enter) based on your preference of writing.
SEND_MESSAGE.UPDATE_SUCCESS: Your settings have been updated successfully

ENTER_KEY.HEADING: Enter (↵)
ENTER_KEY.CONTENT: Send messages by pressing Enter key instead of clicking the send button.

CMD_ENTER_KEY.HEADING: Cmd/Ctrl + Enter (⌘ + ↵)
CMD_ENTER_KEY.CONTENT: Send messages by pressing Cmd/Ctrl + enter key instead of clicking the send button.

INTERFACE_SECTION.TITLE: Interface
INTERFACE_SECTION.NOTE: Customize the look and feel of your Chatwoot dashboard.

FONT_SIZE.TITLE: Font size
FONT_SIZE.NOTE: Adjust the text size across the dashboard based on your preference.
FONT_SIZE.UPDATE_SUCCESS: Your font settings have been updated successfully
FONT_SIZE.UPDATE_ERROR: There is an error while updating the font settings, please try again

MESSAGE_SIGNATURE_SECTION.TITLE: Personal message signature
MESSAGE_SIGNATURE_SECTION.NOTE: Create a unique message signature to appear at the end of every message you send from any inbox. You can also include an inline image, which is supported in live-chat, email, and API inboxes.
MESSAGE_SIGNATURE_SECTION.IMAGE_UPLOAD_SUCCESS: Image added successfully. Please click on save to save the signature
MESSAGE_SIGNATURE_SECTION.IMAGE_UPLOAD_SIZE_ERROR: Image size should be less than {size}MB

MESSAGE_SIGNATURE.LABEL: Message Signature
MESSAGE_SIGNATURE.PLACEHOLDER: Insert your personal message signature here.

PASSWORD_SECTION.TITLE: பாஸ்வேர்ட்
PASSWORD_SECTION.NOTE: உங்கள் பாஸ்வேர்டைப் புதுப்பிப்பது உங்கள் உள்நுழைவுகளை பல சாதனங்களில் மீட்டமைக்கும்.

ACCESS_TOKEN.TITLE: அணுகுவதற்கான டோக்கன்
ACCESS_TOKEN.NOTE: நீங்கள் API அடிப்படையிலான ஒருங்கிணைப்பை உருவாக்கினால் இந்த டோக்கனைப் பயன்படுத்தலாம்

AUDIO_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.TITLE: Audio Alerts
AUDIO_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.NOTE: Enable audio alerts in dashboard for new messages and conversations.

ALERT_COMBINATIONS.NONE: You haven't selected any options, you won't receive any audio alerts.
ALERT_COMBINATIONS.ASSIGNED: You'll receive alerts for conversations assigned to you.
ALERT_COMBINATIONS.UNASSIGNED: You'll receive alerts for any unassigned conversations.
ALERT_COMBINATIONS.NOTME: You'll receive alerts for conversations assigned to others.
ALERT_COMBINATIONS.ASSIGNED+UNASSIGNED: You'll receive alerts for your assigned conversations and any unattended ones.
ALERT_COMBINATIONS.ASSIGNED+NOTME: You'll receive alerts for conversations assigned to you and to others, but not for unassigned ones.
ALERT_COMBINATIONS.NOTME+UNASSIGNED: You'll receive alerts for unattended conversations and those assigned to others.
ALERT_COMBINATIONS.ASSIGNED+NOTME+UNASSIGNED: You'll receive alerts for all conversations.

CONDITIONS.TITLE: Alert conditions:
CONDITIONS.CONDITION_ONE: Send audio alerts only if the browser window is not active
CONDITIONS.CONDITION_TWO: Send alerts every 30s until all the assigned conversations are read

AUDIO_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.SOUND_PERMISSION_ERROR: Autoplay is disabled in your browser. To hear alerts automatically, enable sound permission in your browser settings or interact with the page.

EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.TITLE: ஈமெயில் வழியான அறிவிப்புகள்
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.NOTE: உங்கள் ஈமெயில் வழியான அறிவிப்பு தொடர்பான விருப்பங்களை இங்கே புதுப்பிக்கவும்
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_ASSIGNMENT: ஒரு உரையாடல் எனக்கு ஒதுக்கப்பட்டால் ஈமெயிலில் அறிவிப்புகளை அனுப்பவும்
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_CREATION: புதிய உரையாடல் உருவாக்கப்படும்போது ஈ-மெயிலில் அறிவிப்புகளை அனுப்பவும்
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_MENTION: Send email notifications when you are mentioned in a conversation
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.ASSIGNED_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: Send email notifications when a new message is created in an assigned conversation
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.PARTICIPATING_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: Send email notifications when a new message is created in a participating conversation
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.SLA_MISSED_FIRST_RESPONSE: Send email notifications when a conversation misses first response SLA
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.SLA_MISSED_NEXT_RESPONSE: Send email notifications when a conversation misses next response SLA
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.SLA_MISSED_RESOLUTION: Send email notifications when a conversation misses resolution SLA

NOTIFICATIONS.TITLE: Notification preferences

TYPES.CONVERSATION_ASSIGNED: A conversation is assigned to you
TYPES.CONVERSATION_MENTION: You are mentioned in a conversation
TYPES.ASSIGNED_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: A new message is created in an assigned conversation
TYPES.PARTICIPATING_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: A new message is created in a participating conversation
TYPES.SLA_MISSED_FIRST_RESPONSE: A conversation misses first response SLA
TYPES.SLA_MISSED_NEXT_RESPONSE: A conversation misses next response SLA

NOTIFICATIONS.BROWSER_PERMISSION: Enable push notifications for your browser so you’re able to receive them

API.UPDATE_ERROR: விருப்பங்களை புதுப்பிக்கும்போது பிழை ஏற்பட்டுள்ளது, தயவுசெய்து மீண்டும் முயற்சிக்கவும்

PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.TITLE: புஷ் அறிவிப்புகள்
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.NOTE: உங்கள் புஷ் அறிவிப்பு விருப்பங்களை இங்கே புதுப்பிக்கவும்
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_ASSIGNMENT: ஒரு உரையாடல் எனக்கு ஒதுக்கப்படும் போது புஷ் அறிவிப்புகளை அனுப்பவும்
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_CREATION: புதிய உரையாடல் உருவாக்கப்படும்போது புஷ் அறிவிப்புகளை அனுப்பவும்
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_MENTION: Send push notifications when you are mentioned in a conversation
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.ASSIGNED_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: Send push notifications when a new message is created in an assigned conversation
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.PARTICIPATING_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: Send push notifications when a new message is created in a participating conversation
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.SLA_MISSED_FIRST_RESPONSE: Send push notifications when a conversation misses first response SLA
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.SLA_MISSED_NEXT_RESPONSE: Send push notifications when a conversation misses next response SLA
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.SLA_MISSED_RESOLUTION: Send push notifications when a conversation misses resolution SLA

APP_GLOBAL.EMAIL_VERIFICATION_PENDING: It seems that you haven't verified your email address yet. Please check your inbox for the verification email.
APP_GLOBAL.EMAIL_VERIFICATION_SENT: Verification email has been sent. Please check your inbox.

ACCOUNT_SUSPENDED.MESSAGE: Your account is suspended. Please reach out to the support team for more information.

MEDIA.IMAGE_UNAVAILABLE: This image is no longer available.

 to continue receiving and sending messages

SET_AUTO_OFFLINE.INFO_TEXT: Let the system automatically mark you offline when you aren't using the app or dashboard.
SET_AUTO_OFFLINE.INFO_SHORT: Automatically mark offline when you aren't using the app.

BILLING_SETTINGS.TITLE: Billing
BILLING_SETTINGS.DESCRIPTION: Manage your subscription here, upgrade your plan and get more for your team.

CURRENT_PLAN.TITLE: Current Plan
CURRENT_PLAN.PLAN_NOTE: You are currently subscribed to the **{plan}** plan with **{quantity}** licenses

MANAGE_SUBSCRIPTION.TITLE: Manage your subscription
MANAGE_SUBSCRIPTION.DESCRIPTION: View your previous invoices, edit your billing details, or cancel your subscription.

CAPTAIN.TITLE: Captain
CAPTAIN.DESCRIPTION: Manage usage and credits for Captain AI.
CAPTAIN.UPGRADE: Captain is not available on the free plan, upgrade now to get access to assistants, copilot and more.

CHAT_WITH_US.TITLE: Need help?
CHAT_WITH_US.DESCRIPTION: Do you face any issues in billing? We are here to help.

BILLING_SETTINGS.NO_BILLING_USER: Your billing account is being configured. Please refresh the page and try again.

CREATE_ACCOUNT.NO_ACCOUNT_WARNING: Uh oh! We could not find any Chatwoot accounts. Please create a new account to continue.

API.ERROR_MESSAGE: வூட் சர்வருடன் இணைக்க முடியவில்ல, மீண்டும் முயற்சிக்கவும்
